definition: to fuss around/to buzz about uselessly/to wag one's tongue

sentences.english: The proposed repeat of the corporate tax repatriation holiday is one such wolf in sheep's clothing.
sentences.chinese: 重提回流资金减税就是这种批着羊皮的狼。

sentences.english: Material selection for imported cowhide, sheepskin, such as crocodile skin.
sentences.chinese: 制作材料精选为进口牛皮，羊皮，鳄鱼皮等。

sentences.english: Khaki tote bags and metallic suede clutch bags appeal to you, since you want your accessories to be as eclectic as you are.
sentences.chinese: 卡其布或金属的小山羊皮裁制手提包都很衬你哦。

sentences.english: How many of them were covered with sheepskin and thrown in to wild animals?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人，被披上羊皮，扔进野兽群中？

sentences.english: Pen and brown -ink wash on vellum paper folded twice. 8x7 in.
sentences.chinese: 钢笔，棕色墨水，折叠两次的羊皮纸。

sentences.english: However, for luxurious softness, you can't beat the texture of sheepskin.
sentences.chinese: 然而为了保持绝对的柔软度，请善待的你羊皮手套。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，准备一个羊皮纸内衬平底锅。

sentences.english: Her flat black suede boots and cardigan help make this cooler weather appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 黑色平底的山羊皮长靴和羊毛衫让秋凉望而却步。

sentences.english: He put on the pelt, wearing it like a coat. Then the wolf walked among the sheep like he was one of them.
sentences.chinese: 它像穿外套一样披上羊皮，然后假装成羊走进羊群中。

sentences.english: We want to buy Seafood, Sheepskins, Rapeseed, Edible Oils, Wheats , Gold Bullion.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购海鲜，羊皮，油菜籽，食品油，小麦。

sentences.english: The original singer of the song " The Wolf in Sheep's Clothing" has come to our evening party.
sentences.chinese: 《披著羊皮的狼》的原唱今天也来到了晚会现场。

sentences.english: Inkpots placed the parchments before Tyrion and handed him the quill.
sentences.chinese: 墨水瓶把羊皮纸铺在提利昂面前并递给他羽毛笔。

sentences.english: Cover with a sheet of non-stick baking parchment.
sentences.chinese: 用一张不粘烘焙仿羊皮纸包上。

sentences.english: Look at how the Dead Sea Scrolls were scrutinized.
sentences.chinese: 回想一下吧，死海羊皮卷是如何被深入考究的。

sentences.english: He's really a wolf in sheep's clothing.
sentences.chinese: 他是一只披了羔羊皮的狼。

sentences.english: Civilization is the lamb's skin in which barbarism masquerades.
sentences.chinese: 文明是野蛮在羔羊皮上的化装舞会。

definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
